edu.cornell.gdiac.util

Interface ScreenListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Starstruck

    public interface ScreenListener
    A listener class for responding to a screen's request to exit. This interface is almost always implemented by the root Game class.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void exitScreen(com.badlogic.gdx.Screen screen, int exitCode)
      The given screen has made a request to exit its player mode.
      void exitScreen(com.badlogic.gdx.Screen screen, int exitCode, FilmStrip winStrip, int animDelay, com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 winPos)
      The given screen has made a request to exit its player mode after winning.
      void exitScreen(com.badlogic.gdx.Screen screen, int exitCode, java.lang.String json)
      The given screen has made a request to exit its player mode.
      void exitScreen(com.badlogic.gdx.Screen screen, int exitCode, com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 winPos, java.lang.String json)
      The given screen has made a request to exit its player mode after winning.

    • Method Detail

      • exitScreen

        void exitScreen(com.badlogic.gdx.Screen screen,
                int exitCode,
                java.lang.String json)
        The given screen has made a request to exit its player mode. The value exitCode can be used to implement menu options.
        Parameters:
        screen - The screen requesting to exit
        exitCode - The state of the screen upon exit
        json - The name of the file to load

      • exitScreen

        void exitScreen(com.badlogic.gdx.Screen screen,
                int exitCode)
        The given screen has made a request to exit its player mode. The value exitCode can be used to implement menu options.
        Parameters:
        screen - The screen requesting to exit
        exitCode - The state of the screen upon exit

      • exitScreen

        void exitScreen(com.badlogic.gdx.Screen screen,
                int exitCode,
                FilmStrip winStrip,
                int animDelay,
                com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 winPos)
        The given screen has made a request to exit its player mode after winning. The value exitCode can be used to implement menu options. MUST BE LEVEL SELECT PLS TO NOT FUCK UP. (Might change later depending on where we go)
        Parameters:
        screen - The screen requesting to exit
        exitCode - The state of the screen upon exit

      • exitScreen

        void exitScreen(com.badlogic.gdx.Screen screen,
                int exitCode,
                com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 winPos,
                java.lang.String json)
        The given screen has made a request to exit its player mode after winning. The value exitCode can be used to implement menu options. MUST BE LEVEL SELECT PLS TO NOT FUCK UP. (Might change later depending on where we go)
        Parameters:
        screen - The screen requesting to exit
        exitCode - The state of the screen upon exit
